Articles.Content:
I have a problem, concerning my spaceplane and my minmus base. They are docked on the surface of Minmus, and I want to take my crew home. It just won't undock when I click undock. After I click undock I can't switch betwen the two vessels, I can even address parts of the base and the spaceplane. For the record, I'm using Remote Tech 2(with community hotfix) and Visual Enhancments Mod can anyone help me?

Pic of the situation:

Welcome to the forums!

It might be entirely possible that the issue you're running into is the same one dealt with in this thread. Try out the instructions from that post and see if that helps fix it. (I don't know if that bug's been addressed since the tutorial was first posted, but I suppose it's worth a shot.)

Hope this helps!
Can't seem to get it to work, I can't find my way well enough through my savefile. I think I'll just have to deal with it.
